ComicInfo.Title: The Legend Of Celestra; "...could have saved the planet."; Punctuation Duck Capricious Canine; La Blanca; The Oedwards File

ComicInfo.Summary:
Celstra is sent to appease the demons.
Nibblett is drowning his sorrows.
A duck that speaks in punctuation marks.
The strange story of a ghost
Venus visits an alien-themed amusement park with her aunt.
Venus contemplates her friend and boys.
Just how did a kid get to be firechief?
